name: Backend CI - Build, Test & Push

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "backend", "full_setup" ]
    paths: 
      - 'backend/**'
      - '.github/workflows/ci-backend.yml'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main", "full_setup" ]
    paths:
      - 'backend/**'

env:
  DOCKER_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}
  DOCKER_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}

jobs:
  backend-ci:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    name: Backend Build, Test & Push
    
    steps:
      # 1. Checkout repository
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # 2. Set up JDK 21 for Spring Boot
      - name: Set up JDK 21
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '21'
          distribution: 'temurin'
          
      # 3. Cache Gradle dependencies
      - name: Cache Gradle packages
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: |
            ~/.gradle/caches
            ~/.gradle/wrapper
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-${{ hashFiles('backend/**/*.gradle*', 'backend/**/gradle-wrapper.properties') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-gradle-

      # 4. Make gradlew executable
      - name: Make gradlew executable
        run: chmod +x ./backend/gradlew

      # 5. Run backend tests
      - name: Run backend tests
        working-directory: ./backend
        run: ./gradlew test

      # 6. Build backend JAR
      - name: Build backend application
        working-directory: ./backend
        run: ./gradlew clean build -x test

      # 7. Set up Docker Buildx
      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3

      # 8. Log in to Docker Hub
      - name: Log in to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          username: ${{ env.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ env.DOCKER_TOKEN }}

      # 9. Build and push backend Docker image
      - name: Build and push backend image
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
        with:
          context: ./backend
          file: ./backend/Dockerfile
          push: true
          tags: |
            ${{ env.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/apartment-backend:latest
            ${{ env.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/apartment-backend:${{ github.sha }}
          cache-from: type=gha
          cache-to: type=gha,mode=max
          # Add this to prevent provenance issues
          provenance: false

      # 10. Test deployment readiness
      - name: Backend CI Summary
        run: |
          echo "ðŸŽ‰ Backend CI Pipeline Completed Successfully!"
          echo ""
          echo "âœ… Java 21 & Gradle setup"
          echo "âœ… Backend tests passed"
          echo "âœ… JAR file built successfully"
          echo "âœ… Docker image built and pushed"
          echo ""
          echo "ðŸ“¦ Docker Images:"
          echo "- ${{ env.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/apartment-backend:latest"
          echo "- ${{ env.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/apartment-backend:${{ github.sha }}"
          echo ""
          echo "ðŸ”— Ready for deployment!"
